com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface SoundService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoundServiceImpl, SoundServiceImpl

    public SoundService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundService

        public SoundService()

    • Method Detail

      • playSound

        <L,P> void playSound(L location,
                     Sound sound,
                     P player)

        Plays the given sound at the given location for the given player or all players in the world if the config option is enabled.

        Type Parameters:
        L -

        the type of the location.

        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        sound, location, player
